question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and rise up to the top of the buildings. go right through the column of buildings. go straight and toward the red and green trees. go across the water and stop at the edge where the trees are. take a left turn toward the buildings. go straight toward the tall building and rise to the top of that building.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I go straight toward the red and green trees.  
B. I go across the water and stop at the edge where the trees are.  
C. I fly over buildings.  
D. I go straight to the tall building and rise to the top of it.  
E. I turn left toward the building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The sequence of images shows the agent starting at ground level between buildings and gradually ascending to a higher vantage point above the buildings, indicating that the agent is flying over buildings as per the initial instruction to "rise up to the top of the buildings."
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 15)]
Option: [C]
Reason: The video shows the agent starting at ground level between buildings and gradually ascending to a higher vantage point above the buildings. This indicates that the agent is flying over buildings, which aligns with the initial instruction to "rise up to the top of the buildings."
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: C; Reason: The sequence of images shows the agent starting at ground level between buildings and gradually ascending to a higher vantage point above the buildings, indicating that the agent is flying over buildings as per the initial instruction to "rise up to the top of the buildings."
